You are about to delete your RockWallet account.
-You will no longer be able to use your email to sign in into RockWallet
-Your private keys are still yours, keep your Recovery Phrase in a safe place in case you need to restore your wallet.
-You will no longer be able to user your KYC and registration status
I understand that the only way to recover my wallet is by entering my Recovery Phrase

It looks like you are using a third-party keyboard, which can record what you type and steal your Recovery Phrase. Please switch to the default Android keyboard for extra protection.
There is a problem with your Android OS keystore, please contact hello@rockwallet.com
Your RockWallet encrypted data was recently invalidated because your Android lock screen was disabled.

We can\'t proceed because your screen lock settings have been changed (e.g. password was disabled, fingerprints were changed). For security purposes, Android has permanently locked your key store. Therefore, your RockWallet app data must be wiped by uninstalling.\n\nDon’t worry, your funds are still secure! Reinstall the app and recover your wallet using your Recovery Phrase.

We can\'t proceed because your screen lock settings have been changed (e.g. password was disabled, fingerprints were changed). For security purposes, Android has permanently locked your key store. Therefore, your RockWallet app data must be wiped.\n\nDon’t worry, your funds are still secure! Recover your wallet using your Recovery Phrase.

Any BCH in your wallet can be accessed through the home screen.
We\'ve detected an app that is incompatible with RockWallet running on your device. For security reasons, please disable any screen altering or light filtering apps to proceed.

iCloud Keychain must be turned on for this feature to work.
It should look like the following:
I have turned on iCloud Keychain

Please note, iCloud backup is only as secure as your iCloud account. We still recommend writing down your Recovery Phrase in the following step and keeping it secure. The Recovery Phrase is the only way to recover your wallet if you can no longer access iCloud.
iCloud Keychain must be turned on in the iOS Settings app for this feature to work
Are you sure you want to disable iCloud Backup? This will delete your backup from all devices.

You don’t have enough %s in your wallet in order to transfer this type of token.
You must have at least %s in your wallet in order to transfer this type of token
%s is an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain and requires ETH network fees. Please add ETH to your wallet.
The amount is higher than your daily limit of %s USD. Please upgrade your account or enter a lower amount.
The amount is higher than your lifetime limit of %s USD. Please upgrade your account or enter a lower amount.
The amount is higher than the lifetime limit of %s %s. We’ll be expanding the current limits soon, stay tuned!
The amount is higher than your daily limit of %s USD. Please enter a lower amount.
A maximum of one swap can be active for a currency at a time.
In order to successfully perform a swap, make sure you have two or more of our supported swap assets (BSV, BTC, ETH, BCH, SHIB, USDT) activated and funded within your wallet.
Oops! Something went wrong, please try again later.
The amount is higher than the swap maximum of %s %s.

Use your fingerprint to unlock your RockWallet app and send transactions.
RockWallet is providing Buy functionality through Wyre, a third-party API provider.
RockWallet is providing Swap functionality through Changelly, a third-party API provider.
You are importing %1$s from this private key into your RockWallet. There will be a network fee of %2$s.
This private key is already in your wallet.
Transaction fees would cost more than the funds available on this private key.
Sweeping a wallet transfers all the money from your other wallet into your RockWallet using a single transaction.
This private key is password protected.
Sweeping a wallet does not include transaction history or other details.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access RockWallet\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin! Wipe this wallet immediately and restore on a secure device.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access RockWallet\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin. Please only use RockWallet on a non-jailbroken device.
External apps cannot send money without approval from this device

Your wallet name only appears in your account transaction history and cannot be seen by anyone else.

Empowering you to navigate the digital asset economy easily and securely

Your Recovery Phrase must be saved in case you lose or change your phone.
Set up your Recovery Phrase in case you ever lose or replace your phone. Your key is also required if you change your phone\'s security settings.
Your review helps grow the RockWallet community.
Your wallet may be out of sync. This can often be fixed by pulling down this screen to refresh.
Help improve RockWallet by sharing your anonymous data with us

Restore your RockWallet with your Recovery Phrase.

To reset your PIN, enter the words from your Recovery Phrase into the boxes below.

Some of the words you entered do not match your Recovery Phrase. Please try again.
Your key is only needed for recovery, not for everyday wallet access.
For security purposes, do not screenshot or email these words
Write down your key on paper and confirm it. Screenshots are not recommended for security reasons.
Please enter the Recovery Phrase of the wallet you want to restore.
Remember to write these words down. Swipe back if you forgot.
Please enter your Recovery Phrase to reset your PIN.
Buy and trade knowing that your funds are protected by the best security and privacy in the business.
Store your key in a secure location. This is the only way to recover your wallet. RockWallet does not keep a copy.
Congratulations! You completed your Recovery Phrase setup.
You\'re all set to deposit, trade, and buy crypto from your RockWallet.
Unlink your wallet from this device.

Wallet must be recovered to regain access.
Wipe your wallet from this device.
Start a new wallet by wiping the current wallet from your device.
Write down your Recovery Phrase again
Write down the following words in order.
Keep your Recovery Phrase in a secure location
This is required to restore your wallet if you upgrade or lose your phone.
For security reasons, screenshots are not recommended, as anyone with your Recovery Phrase can access your funds.
Remember that this is the only way to restore your wallet. RockWallet does not keep a copy.

If a transaction shows as completed on the network but not in your RockWallet.

The only way to access your assets if you lose or upgrade your phone.
Protects your RockWallet from unauthorized users.
Conveniently unlock your RockWallet and send money up to a set limit.
Thank you for helping move bitcoin forward.

SegWit support is still a beta feature.

Once SegWit is enabled, it will not be possible
to disable it. You will be able to find the legacy address under Settings. 

Some third-party services, including crypto trading, may be unavailable to users who have enabled SegWit. In case of emergency, you will be able to generate a legacy address from Preferences > Bitcoin Settings. 

SegWit will automatically be enabled for all
users in a future update.
Enabling SegWit is an irreversible feature. Are you sure you want to continue?
RockWallet is not allowed to access the camera

Bitcoin addresses are intended for single use only.
Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn\'t directly control the address.
Only send Bitcoin (BTC) to this address. Any other asset sent to this address will be lost permanently.
Help improve RockWallet by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.

Your Recovery Phrase is the only way to restore your RockWallet if your phone is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded.\n\nWe will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.

Your Recovery Phrase is the only way to restore your RockWallet if your phone is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded.

Your Recovery Phrase is also required if you change the security settings on your device.

We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
In order to successfully perform a swap, make sure you have two or more of our supported swap assets (BSV, BTC, ETH, BCH, SHIB, USDT) activated and funded within your wallet.

The RockWallet app requires you to set a PIN to secure your wallet, separate from your device passcode.
You will be required to enter the PIN to view your balance or send money, which keeps your wallet private even if you let someone use your phone or if your phone is stolen by someone who knows your device passcode.
Do not forget your wallet PIN! It can only be reset by using your Recovery Phrase. If you forget your PIN and lose your Recovery Phrase, your wallet will be lost.
Why do I need a PIN?
Authorize to copy wallet address to clipboard

Why should I verify my account?

If you verify your account, you are given access to:
	• Unlimited deposits/withdrawals
	• Enhanced security
	• Full asset support
	• Buy assets with credit card
